gender.Description: self-rated by participant, M for male/F for female

handedness.Description: handedness of the participant as reported by the participant

education_years.Description: years of education calculated as formal education of 6 months or more. starts from the first year of primary/elementary school onwards

highest_level_education_completed.Description: the highest level of formal education completed (i.e., does not include uncompleted education or education currently undertaken)

visual_impairment.Description: any kind of vision impairment including wearing reading glasses

hearing_impairment.Description: whether the participant has hearing impairment

hearing_specify.Description: specify the kind of hearing impairment

personal_history_mental_illness.Description: whether the participant has history mental illness

mental_illness_history_specify.Description: diagnosis or treatment of whether the person has received a diagnosis for any Axis I psychiatric condition

personal_history_mental_illness_ever_dia.Description: Whether a family member had suspected or diagnosed mental illness

personal_history_mental_illness_receive_.Description: Whether the person diagnosed with mental illness disease received treatment

family_history_mental_illness.Description: whether the participant has family history mental illness

family_health_mental_illness_specify.Description: diagnosis or treatment of the family member’s psychiatric condition

family_history_dementia.Description: Whether a family member had suspected or diagnosed dementia

family_history_dementia_specify.Description: specify the family member had suspected or diagnosed dementia and the condition

family_history_dementia_ever_diagnosed.Description: Whether the family member had diagnosed dementia

cardiovascular.Description: Whether the person has a current or previous cardiovascular condition

diabetes.Description: Whether the person has a current or previous diabetes diagnosis

current_tobacco.Description: Whether the person has tobacco currently

current_tobacco_average_per_day.Description: how many tobacco average per day

ever_smoked_average.Description: how many ever smoked in average

ever_consumed_alcohol.Description: whether the participant ever consumed alcohol

ever_alcohol_.Description: whether the participant ever consumed alcohol

standard_drinks_per_occasion.Description: how many standard drinks per occasion

recreational_drugs_last_6_months.Description: used recreational drugs in last 6 months

drugs_specify.Description: description of recreational drugs used in last 6 months

drugs_how_often.Description: how often the recreational drugs were used in last 6 months

visual_impairments.Description: There should have been a description here, but there wasn't. :(
